name: test_openfga_integrations[flask_app-8000]
description:
arrange: Build and deploy the charm. Integrate the charm with OpenFGA.
    act: Send a read authorization models request from the charm.
    assert: The request succeeds.

arrange: Build and deploy the charm. Integrate the charm with OpenFGA.
act: Send a read authorization models request from the charm.
assert: The request succeeds.
